translation.registrationSuccessful: You've been registered successfully. You can now move on to <1>login</1>.
translation.createNewGameNotLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to create a new game
translation.waitingForPlayerHeading_one: You are waiting for {{player}} to make their move.
translation.waitingForPlayerHeading_other: You are waiting for {{player}} to make their move.
translation.guessHeading: Finally, its your turn to guess!
translation.interceptHeading: You can now step in and make another guess, but be aware, it'll cost you one token!
translation.confirmHeading: You now need to confirm if {{player}} guessed title and artist of the song correctly. Be fair!
translation.confirmText: Did {{player}} guess artist and title correctly?
translation.guessText: Do you think this hit belongs...
translation.cannotSubmitGuess: You cannot submit a guess right now
translation.joinGameNotLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to participate in a game
translation.name: Name
translation.startGameNotLoggedIn: You must be logged in to start or stop a game
translation.startGameNotEnoughPlayers: At least two players must be part of a game
translation.startGameNotCreator: Only the creator can start or stop a game
translation.creator: creator
translation.title: Title
translation.hitNoGameRunning: No game is currently running, so no hit for you!
translation.hitUnknown: The hit is currently unknown, you'll have to wait for it to be revealed.
translation.hitRevealed: You're currently listening to <0>{{title}}</0> by <1>{{artist}}</1> from <2>{{year}}</2> and {{player}} guessed it correctly. This song belongs to the <3>{{pack}}</3> pack. You can now play it at full length.
translation.skipHit: Skip this hit by paying one token
translation.skipHitNotLoggedIn: You are not logged in and cannot skip a hit
translation.skipHitNotGuessing: Only the guessing player can skip a hit
translation.skipHitNoToken: You need to pay a token to skip a hit
translation.cannotSkipHit: You cannot skip a hit right now
translation.otherWins: {{player}} is the winner of this game!
translation.finalScore: And here are the final results:
translation.gameSettingsHitGoal: How many hits do the players need to guess correctly in order to win?
translation.gameSettingsStartTokens: How many tokens should every player get when starting a game?
translation.gameSettingsHitDuration: How many seconds of a hit will every player hear when guessing?
translation.gameSettingsNotLoggedIn: You need to be logged in to change game settings
translation.gameSettingsNotOpen: The game needs to be stopped to change its settings
translation.gameSettingsNotCreator: Only the creator can change a game's settings
translation.gameSettingsPacks: Check all the packs you want to use in this game:
